article: An old man lived in the suburb of London, and he would wake up every morning and go to the subway. He would get the  _  right to Central London, and then sit at the street corner and beg. He would do this every single  _  of his life. He sat at the  _  street corner and begged for almost 20 years. His house was  _  , and a stench came out of the house and it smelled horribly. The  _  could not stand the smell anymore,  _  they asked the police officers to clean the place. The officers  _  down the door and cleaned the house. When he arrived home that evening, he was met by one of the officers who told him that there was no  _  for him to beg any more as he was a rich man now, a millionaire. The next morning he woke up as usual, went to the subway, got into the train, and sat at the street corner and  _  to beg.  _  , this old man had no great plans,  _  or anything significant for his life.
